Experienced Customer Service Manager Job at Keen British School




        
    

        
        Keen British School - We provide children and youth with high quality education that enhances knowledge, personal development, social skills and creativity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Experienced Customer Service Manager

Job Location: Lagos

Requirement
     

            
    




	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc qualification


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@keenbritishschool.org using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IP Operations Engineer",
  "description": "Cobranet Limited is a reputable organization incorporated in 2003 and provides internet solutions. Our footprint and range of products have grown immensely since incorporation and we are proud to provide every segment of society with a reliable link to the digital universe.

Our entire network topology is rugged, dynamic and fully redundant with negligible downtimes: content showing extremely high availability exceeding 99.5%. Our promise is to continue providing innovative solutions at the best feature-to-price and service-to-price ratio.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IP Operations Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Provide technical support for corporate clients.
	Design implements and support IT, Security and Network Solutions for corporate clients.
	Troubleshoot Core network problems.
	Upgrade core network equipment and configuration.


Personal Responsibilities


	Report to the Head of Department.
	Responsible for all assigned equipment to his team.
	Should maintain a high level of personal responsibility in order to be an example to his colleagues.
	Keeping up to date with departmental and company notification via Emails, Notice board and other mediums
	Keeps himself up-to-date with the technologies required by companies.
	Abide and apply the rules and regulations of the department and the company as a whole.
	Responsible for achieving any assignment given by his manager
	High ability and readiness for any kind of urgent intervention at client sites to meet SLAs.


Technical Skills:


	In depth knowledge of TCP/IP protocol stack
	Configuration and maintenance of network equipment including routers, switches, Firewalls
	Experience in Mikrotik and cisco devices configuration
	Solid Understanding of Layer 3 technologies (EIGRP, OSPF, BGP.) and layer 2 technologies (VLAN, trunks, STP.)
	Maximizing network performance through ongoing monitoring and troubleshooting
	Good Knowledge in Unix Servers (Redhat, Centos, and Debian&hellip;)
	Ability to understand and work on new technologies and to quickly adopt to equipment made by different vendors.
	Ability to design topologies and provide consultancy for corporate customers.
	Troubleshooting, diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and other network and system problems.
	LAC/LNS Implementation and troubleshooting knowledge.
	MPLS L2VPNs, L3VPNs and VPLS knowledge is a plus.
	Cisco ASA and Juniper firewalls configuration and maintenance is a plus.


General Skills:


	Interpersonal relationship.
	Maintain a good communication and interaction with customers and colleagues.
	Team player.
	Knowledge sharing.
	Communications skills, both verbal and written.


Academic / Education Qualifications


	B.Sc (or equivalent) in Computer Science, Computer Communication Engineering or Telecom.


Certifications:


	CCNA is a must.
	CCNP is preferable.


Experience:


	At least 3 years of proven hands-on experience in network engineering.


Language Qualifications:


	Good verbal and writing skills in English are mandatory.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@cobranet.ng&nbsp;using&nbsp;&quot;IP Operations Engineer&quot; as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-08-01",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-11",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Cobranet Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",

  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

    }
  }
}



IP Operations Engineer Job at Cobranet Limited




        
    

        
        Cobranet Limited is a reputable organization incorporated in 2003 and provides internet solutions. Our footprint and range of products have grown immensely since incorporation and we are proud to provide every segment of society with a reliable link to the digital universe.

Our entire network topology is rugged, dynamic and fully redundant with negligible downtimes: content showing extremely high availability exceeding 99.5%. Our promise is to continue providing innovative solutions at the best feature-to-price and service-to-price ratio.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IP Operations Engineer
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Description


	Provide technical support for corporate clients.
	Design implements and support IT, Security and Network Solutions for corporate clients.
	Troubleshoot Core network problems.
	Upgrade core network equipment and configuration.


Personal Responsibilities


	Report to the Head of Department.
	Responsible for all assigned equipment to his team.
	Should maintain a high level of personal responsibility in order to be an example to his colleagues.
	Keeping up to date with departmental and company notification via Emails, Notice board and other mediums
	Keeps himself up-to-date with the technologies required by companies.
	Abide and apply the rules and regulations of the department and the company as a whole.
	Responsible for achieving any assignment given by his manager
	High ability and readiness for any kind of urgent intervention at client sites to meet SLAs.


Technical Skills:


	In depth knowledge of TCP/IP protocol stack
	Configuration and maintenance of network equipment including routers, switches, Firewalls
	Experience in Mikrotik and cisco devices configuration
	Solid Understanding of Layer 3 technologies (EIGRP, OSPF, BGP.) and layer 2 technologies (VLAN, trunks, STP.)
	Maximizing network performance through ongoing monitoring and troubleshooting
	Good Knowledge in Unix Servers (Redhat, Centos, and Debian…)
	Ability to understand and work on new technologies and to quickly adopt to equipment made by different vendors.
	Ability to design topologies and provide consultancy for corporate customers.
	Troubleshooting, diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and other network and system problems.
	LAC/LNS Implementation and troubleshooting knowledge.
	MPLS L2VPNs, L3VPNs and VPLS knowledge is a plus.
	Cisco ASA and Juniper firewalls configuration and maintenance is a plus.


General Skills:


	Interpersonal relationship.
	Maintain a good communication and interaction with customers and colleagues.
	Team player.
	Knowledge sharing.
	Communications skills, both verbal and written.


Academic / Education Qualifications


	B.Sc (or equivalent) in Computer Science, Computer Communication Engineering or Telecom.


Certifications:


	CCNA is a must.
	CCNP is preferable.


Experience:


	At least 3 years of proven hands-on experience in network engineering.


Language Qualifications:


	Good verbal and writing skills in English are mandatory.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@cobranet.ng using "IP Operations Engineer" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Content Creator",
  "description": "Prestigious Consulting is a professional HR consultancy firm. We focus on improving organizational performance through strategic people &amp; process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Develop engaging content for social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, etc.).
	Create and edit videos, graphics, and written posts for marketing campaigns.
	Monitor trends and insights to optimize content strategies.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to execute campaigns.
	Ensure brand consistency across all content.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Proven experience as a content creator or similar role.
	Proficiency in Canva, video editing tools, and social media management.
	Creative thinking and storytelling skills.
	Excellent written and verbal communication.


Salary
N120,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to:&nbsp;hrprestigiousconsulting@outlook.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-15",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Prestigious Consulting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Content Creator Job at Prestigious Consulting




        
    

        
        Prestigious Consulting is a professional HR consultancy firm. We focus on improving organizational performance through strategic people & process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop engaging content for social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, etc.).
	Create and edit videos, graphics, and written posts for marketing campaigns.
	Monitor trends and insights to optimize content strategies.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to execute campaigns.
	Ensure brand consistency across all content.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Proven experience as a content creator or similar role.
	Proficiency in Canva, video editing tools, and social media management.
	Creative thinking and storytelling skills.
	Excellent written and verbal communication.


Salary
N120,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: hrprestigiousconsulting@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

We are recruiting talented and experienced candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media and Content Creation Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos

Job Summary


	We&rsquo;re seeking someone who not only has a creative flair and strong content creation skills, but also has prior experience in Social Media Management, Affiliate Marketing, and Telesales.


&nbsp;Requirements


	Interested candidate should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree with 3years work experience.
	Proven prior experience in Social Media Management (Instagram, Facebook, X/Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.)
	Excellent content creation skills &ndash; graphics, short-form video, and copywriting
	Must be creative, highly organized, and aware of social trends
	Solid background in Affiliate Marketing and campaign execution
	Previous exposure to or experience in Telesales and customer engagement
	Strong communication and analytical skills
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N400,000 - N600,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;cv@ascentech.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Social Media &amp; Content Creation Manager&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the email.",

Social Media and Content Creation Manager Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting talented and experienced candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media and Content Creation Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We’re seeking someone who not only has a creative flair and strong content creation skills, but also has prior experience in Social Media Management, Affiliate Marketing, and Telesales.


 Requirements


	Interested candidate should possess an HND / B.Sc Degree with 3years work experience.
	Proven prior experience in Social Media Management (Instagram, Facebook, X/Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.)
	Excellent content creation skills – graphics, short-form video, and copywriting
	Must be creative, highly organized, and aware of social trends
	Solid background in Affiliate Marketing and campaign execution
	Previous exposure to or experience in Telesales and customer engagement
	Strong communication and analytical skills
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N400,000 - N600,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using "Social Media & Content Creation Manager" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Marketer Job at Babtech Computers




        
    

        
        Babtech Computers is a leading technology company based in Nigeria, with a reputation for providing world-class computer education, software development, and corporate training services. With a commitment to excellence and a passion for innovation, Babtech Computers has become a trusted partner for individuals, organizations, and businesses across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Energetic and persuasive communicators
	Street-smart and creative thinkers
	Good command of English and local dialects
	Ability to work independently and as a team
	Prior marketing experience is necessary.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Curriculum Vitae to: recruitment@babtechcomputers.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
